Name: Sergeant RocketShade
Description: Hailing from the digital frontiers of the WebtrES club, Sergeant RocketShade is a valorous veteran of countless cyber skirmishes. Adorned in the fiery hues of rossoCorsa, he stands out as a beacon of strength and speed. His screen may be broken, a testament to his resilience in the face of adversity, but his vision is unimpaired thanks to his trusty glasses. With arms and legs powered by rockets, he zooms across the virtual landscapes, always first to the fray. The soldier buttons on his chassis click with precision, each press launching a new tactical maneuver. Sergeant RocketShade's exploits are the stuff of legend, garnering respect and awe from every corner of the digital realm.
